fields.name: Fruit Juices
fields.description: Juices made from a variety of fresh fruits such as apples, oranges, mangoes, and more, ideal for a refreshing and healthy drink.

fields.name: Vegetable Juices
fields.description: Juices made from fresh vegetables like carrots, beets, cucumbers, and spinach, known for their high nutrient content and health benefits.

fields.name: Smoothies
fields.description: Blended drinks made from fruits, vegetables, yogurt, or milk, often including added ingredients like nuts or protein powders for a thicker, nutrient-dense beverage.

fields.name: Green Juices
fields.description: Juices that primarily contain green vegetables such as kale, spinach, and cucumber, often combined with fruits for a balanced, detoxifying drink.

fields.name: Detox Juices
fields.description: Juices designed to cleanse and detoxify the body, typically containing ingredients known for their cleansing properties such as lemon, ginger, and celery.

fields.name: Citrus Juices
fields.description: Juices made from citrus fruits like oranges, lemons, limes, and grapefruits, known for their high vitamin C content and refreshing taste.

fields.name: Tropical Juices
fields.description: Juices made from tropical fruits such as pineapple, mango, papaya, and coconut, offering an exotic and sweet flavor.

fields.name: Berry Juices
fields.description: Juices made from berries like strawberries, blueberries, raspberries, and blackberries, rich in antioxidants and vitamins.

fields.name: Exotic Juices
fields.description: Juices made from less common, exotic fruits like dragon fruit, guava, passion fruit, and lychee, providing unique flavors and nutritional benefits.

fields.name: Herbal Juices
fields.description: Juices that incorporate herbs such as mint, basil, and parsley, often combined with fruits or vegetables for added health benefits and flavors.

fields.name: Nut Milks
fields.description: Plant-based milks made from nuts such as almonds, cashews, and hazelnuts, offering a creamy texture and rich flavor, often used as a base for other drinks.

fields.name: Protein Shakes
fields.description: Shakes that include protein powders or high-protein ingredients like Greek yogurt, designed to provide a protein boost for workouts and muscle recovery.

fields.name: Energy Juices
fields.description: Juices formulated to provide a natural energy boost, often containing ingredients like green tea, ginseng, and chia seeds.

fields.name: Immunity Boosters
fields.description: Juices made with ingredients known to support the immune system, such as turmeric, ginger, and citrus fruits, to help ward off illness.

fields.name: Kids Juices
fields.description: Juices designed specifically for children, focusing on a balance of flavor and nutrition, often containing a mix of fruits and vegetables that appeal to younger taste buds.
